instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2523: What is 820-2523? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: powers on to white screen only
threads.message:
I'm working on this p.o.s <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2523</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b 

The machine powers on to a white screen only
reset smc
reset pram
checked the 1.05v power rail 
still no change

kinda lost, any suggestions?

threads.title: powers on to white screen only
threads.message: Voltage on <CAPACITOR>C9002</CAPACITOR>? If nothing then check L9000 and enable signal to U90000.

threads.title: powers on to white screen only
threads.message: I can believe i missed that. Thanks. <CAPACITOR>C9002</CAPACITOR> was blown to pieces.

threads.title: powers on to white screen only
threads.message: Update on this machine. After replacing the broken <CAPACITOR>C9002</CAPACITOR> i got it to boot and display flashing folder 1 time. After a shut down and restart, back to the same white screen no image. This morning i powered it on and got the boot menu and booted to asd 3s132 before i ran the test it failed for mux switching. . question is- Is there anything else that would cause this issue besides a failed gpu? also i fails for cpu 0 vcore, thermal interface, ethernet controller, and cpu diode unable to read sensor.
